name: Row Your Boat (Goji Play)
description:
Go merrily down the stream in the fun and casual game Row Your Boat. Cruise down the river in your boat avoiding various obstacles and collecting ducks which increase your score. Optimized for use with Goji Play, you can see the distance you've traveled and your time spent on your journey.

Unlock new outfits, characters and vignettes that provide light-hearted moments as you make your way down the river.
